alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 7:13PM CDT until July 05 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN DESOTO AND SOUTH CENTRAL SHELBY COUNTIES... At 713 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lynchburg, or near Horn Lake, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Memphis, Walls, Lake Cormorant, Lynchburg, Whitehaven, Alden, Twin Lakes, Parkway Village, Nesbit, West Days, Capleville, Lake View, Glover, Jago, Plum Point and Norfolk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
